description: The exterior area of Punk Hazard where the battle between Franky Shogun and the Donquixote Pirates takes place, featuring ice mountains and frozen terrain.

keyEvents.title: General Cannon Devastates Terrain
keyEvents.description: Franky's General Cannon attack damages the ice mountains of Punk Hazard over a large area, showing the destructive power of the technique.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the environmental impact of Franky's most powerful attack.

name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: Caesar Clown's research laboratory on Punk Hazard, featuring mine cart tunnels used for escape.

keyEvents.title: Mine Cart Escape
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats, G-5 Marines, and others escape from the facility using a mine cart through the tunnels.
keyEvents.significance: The group successfully evacuates from Caesar's laboratory.
